long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link Opener

Automatically open multiple links in new tabs with a customizable delay and easy start/stop functionality.

Are you tired of manually opening a list of URLs one by one? With Link Opener, you can effortlessly manage your browsing tasks. Simply paste your URLs into the extensionâ€™s popup, set your desired delay between each tab, and let Link Opener handle the rest. Perfect for users who need to monitor multiple web pages or manage a set of links for work or personal use.

Features:

Easy URL Input: Paste multiple URLs, separated by commas, directly into the extension.
Customizable Delay: Set the number of seconds to wait before opening each new tab.
One-Click Start/Stop: Begin or halt the tab opening process with a single button click.
Background Operation: Open tabs without switching focus from your current window.
How It Works:

Open the extension popup by clicking the Link Opener icon in your browser toolbar.
Paste your URLs into the text box and specify the delay time.
Click "Start" to begin opening your links in new tabs, or "Stop" to halt the process at any time.
Ideal For:

Managing multiple web-based tasks
Checking updates across various pages
Simplifying repetitive browsing actions
Boost your productivity and streamline your web browsing with Link Opener. Try it today!
